testcase.name: ConfigureAppium

error.message:
Appium HTTP server is not listening at http://127.0.0.1:4723/ after 20000 ms timeout. Consider increasing the server startup timeout value and check the server log for possible error messages occurrences. Node.js executable path: C:\Program Files
odejs
ode.exe Arguments: [C:\Users\Veronika\AppData\Roaming
pm
ode_modules\appium uild\lib\main.js, --port, 4723, --address, 127.0.0.1] Server log: [35m[Appium][39m Welcome to Appium v2.5.2 [35m[Appium][39m Non-default server args: [35m[Appium][39m { address: [32m'127.0.0.1'[39m } [35m[Appium][39m The autodetected Appium home path: C:\Users\Veronika\.appium [35m[Appium][39m Attempting to load driver uiautomator2... [35m[Appium][39m Attempting to load driver xcuitest... [35m[Appium][39m Attempting to load driver gecko... [35m[Appium][39m Requiring driver at C:\Users\Veronika\.appium
ode_modules\appium-uiautomator2-driver uild\index.js [35m[Appium][39m Requiring driver at C:\Users\Veronika\.appium
ode_modules\appium-xcuitest-driver uild\index.js [35m[Appium][39m Requiring driver at C:\Users\Veronika\.appium
ode_modules\appium-geckodriver uild\index.js [35m[Appium][39m AndroidUiautomator2Driver has been successfully loaded in 1.434s [35m[Appium][39m XCUITestDriver has been successfully loaded in 1.434s [35m[Appium][39m GeckoDriver has been successfully loaded in 1.434s [38;5;0m[HTTP][0m Could not start REST http interface listener. The requested port may already be in use. Please make sure there is no other instance of this server running already. [35m[Appium][39m Could not configure Appium server. It's possible that a driver or plugin tried to update the server and failed. Original error: listen EADDRINUSE: address already in use 127.0.0.1:4723 [35m[Appium][39m Error: listen EADDRINUSE: address already in use 127.0.0.1:4723 [35m[Appium][39m at Server.setupListenHandle [as _listen2] (node:net:1897:16) [35m[Appium][39m at listenInCluster (node:net:1945:12) [35m[Appium][39m at doListen (node:net:2109:7) [35m[Appium][39m at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:83:21)
